alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:20PM CDT until July 18 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI...SOUTHWESTERN PEMISCOT AND SOUTHERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hornersville, or near Senath, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Kennett, Gosnell, Manila, Steele, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Cooter, Dell, Burdette, Holland, Calumet, Dearman, Buckeye, Arkmo, Noland, Lens Ford and Stark City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
